com.example.jacob.mybrary

Class FriendListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.jacob.mybrary.FriendListController

  • public class FriendListController
extends java.lang.Object
    Interacts between the model and the activity to start processes on new threads

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewFriend(java.lang.String friend, android.content.Context context)
      adds a new friend, with partial matches, based on the string entered by the user in the friendslist activity, and does so on a new thread
      void removeFriend(java.lang.String friend, android.content.Context context)
      starts a new thread to remove a friend from the localuser based on longpressed user
      void updateFriendList(android.app.Activity parent, android.widget.ListView friendListView, android.content.Context context)
      Starts a new thread to update the network status, retrieves all friends from server if possible, and updates the UI appropriately
      void updateUI(android.widget.ListView view, android.widget.ArrayAdapter<?> adapter, android.app.Activity parent)
      This updates the UI via the adapter in FriendsListActivity
